sentences.en: a chatty letter about her summer holidays
sentences.cn: 一封写她暑假生活的家常信

sentences.en: Angelina Jolie sure has been in a chatty mood recently.
sentences.cn: 安吉丽娜朱莉最近一定比较喜欢聊天.

sentences.en: He had never known him to be so chatty and cordial.
sentences.cn: 他从没见过他如此健谈，如此友善。

sentences.en: He was in an unusually chatty mood.
He's a friendly chatty sort of person.
sentences.cn: 他这个人挺和善,很爱讲话.

sentences.en: Herein my ID is very chatty, call me Black Dragon.
sentences.cn: 鉴于我的ID很绕口, 叫我黑龙.

sentences.en: Holmes used an informal, chatty tone in his essays.
sentences.cn: 霍姆斯在文章中语气轻松随便.

sentences.en: My neighbour's very chatty — she tells me all the news.
sentences.cn: 我的邻居非常爱说话,所有的消息都是她告诉我的.

sentences.en: Normally chatty Mckinsey partners clam up when asked about the race.
sentences.cn: 平时喋喋不休的麦肯锡合伙人在被问及这场“赛马”的时候三缄其口.

sentences.en: Relaxed and chatty, she charmed a crowd of journalists.
sentences.cn: 她的轻松和亲切博得很多记者的赞赏.

sentences.en: Some people get chatty and are hard to get off the phone.
sentences.cn: 有些人喜欢聊天,而且很难让他放下电话.

sentences.en: That girl in PR is really a chatty Cathy.
sentences.cn: 这位公关小姐能说会道.

words.tran_cn: 唠叨；饶舌；（动物的）啁啾声；潺潺流水声
饶舌的人；喋喋不休的人
唠叨；喋喋不休；（动物等）吱吱叫
喋喋不休地说；使卡嗒卡嗒作声

trans.tran_cn: 爱闲聊的，爱说话的，（文章风格）聊天式的，闲谈式的
trans.tran_en: liking to talk a lot in a friendly way
